statements: DELETE FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND streetlight_id = 100
DELETE FROM streetlight_sensors WHERE luminosity > 50 AND motion_detected = TRUE
DELETE FROM smart_streetlights WHERE location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 AND streetlight_id IN (SELECT id FROM smart_streetlights WHERE sensor_type = 'motion')
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE streetlight_id = 10 AND maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND installation_date < '2020-01-01';
